signature_action: observing from sidelines with knowing expression, sardonic side-eye, casual lean with arms folded, reacting to chaos with amusement

relationships.spartan: rivalry and banter, enjoys provoking him

description: Peepo is a cute, expressive frog-like cartoon character with a friendly, slightly goofy vibe, often posed in simple gestural stances as if reacting or presenting something.

features.distinguishing: Green frog-like head with oversized glossy eyes, small simple mouth (sometimes with red lips), smooth rounded 3D look, often shown against a solid black background; short, childlike proportions with simple hands/feet
features.costume: A blue button-front one-piece or suit-like outfit (shirt/jumpsuit appearance) with visible buttons down the front; typically no accessories
features.style: 3D cartoon / stylized character render with smooth surfaces and exaggerated facial features

images.description: Front-facing full-body 3D cartoon green frog-like character with large glossy eyes and a blue buttoned suit, standing with both arms raised in a gesture on a solid black background.
A stylized green frog-like character with large glossy eyes and red lips, wearing a blue suit-like body, shown lying on its side against a solid black background.
A stylized green frog character shown from the chest up, facing forward with large glossy eyes and a slight closed-mouth smile, wearing a blue button-up shirt on a solid black background.

A 3D cartoon green frog-like character with large eyes wearing a blue buttoned outfit, standing on the seat of a gray armchair with one hand resting on the right armrest against a solid black background.
A stylized green frog-like character with oversized glossy eyes and a blue buttoned one-piece outfit, shown full-body on a black background with one hand raised in a gesture.
A 3D green cartoon frog-like character with oversized glossy eyes and a small mouth, wearing a blue buttoned outfit, standing in a 3/4 view on a solid black background.
Full-body 3D green frog-like character in a blue buttoned outfit, facing slightly left with arms outstretched on a solid black background.
Back view of a stylized 3D green-skinned character wearing a blue outfit, standing against a solid black background.
A stylized 3D green frog-like character in a blue one-piece outfit is shown full-body, tilted diagonally against a solid black background with arms slightly out and large glossy eyes.
A 3D cartoon green frog-like character in a blue button-front outfit stands in a 3/4 left view with both hands raised against a solid black background.
